data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @cobuspienaar @willemhuman 

Below are the fields that i send to the front end.

[UniqueID] (INT)
[ID Number] (blank value)
[Non-SA ID] VARCHAR(255)
[Age] (INT)
[Surname VARCHAR(255)
[Name 1] VARCHAR(255)
[Name 2] VARCHAR(255)
[Name 3] (blank value) 
[No Street or Building] VARCHAR(50)
[Suburb] VARCHAR(50)
[City] VARCHAR(50)
[Province] VARCHAR(50)
[Postal Code] VARCHAR(50)
[Home Code] (blank value) 
[Home Telephone] VARCHAR(50)
[Work Code] (blank value) 
[Work Telephone] VARCHAR(50)
[Cell Number] VARCHAR(50)
[Fax Code] (blank value) 
[Fax Telephone] VARCHAR(50)
[Case Number] VARCHAR(255)
[Case Filing Date] DATETIME
[Case Type] VARCHAR(255)
[Case Reason] VARCHAR(255)
[Amount] DECIMAL(18,2),
[Court Name] VARCHAR(255)
[Court City] VARCHAR(255)
[Court Type] VARCHAR(255)
[Court Case ID] (INT),
[Plaintiff 1 Name and Surname] VARCHAR(255) + VARCHAR(255)
[Plaintiff 1 Address] VARCHAR(255)
[Attorney Name] VARCHAR(255)
[Office Code] (blank value) 
[Office Number] VARCHAR(50)
[Fax Code1] (blank value) 				
[Fax Number] VARCHAR(50)
[Address 1] VARCHAR(50)
[Suburb1] VARCHAR(50)
[City1] VARCHAR(50)
[Province1] VARCHAR(50)
[Postal Code1] VARCHAR(50)
[Unique Ref] (blank value)
[Party ID] (blank value)
[Captured Date] DATETIME
[Last Verified Date] DATETIME
[Exists] (1)
[ExistsRec] (1)
[Extract] (1)
[CaseInformationID] (INT)
[CreditBureauID] (1)
[isAdminOrder] (1)
